      • addRoomRecord

        public void addRoomRecord(Room room)
        This addRoomRecord method takes a Room object as a parameter and de-constructs it into object variables which are loaded into a String[]
        Parameters:
        room - A room Object

      • addRoomRecord

        public void addRoomRecord(java.lang.String[] roomArray)
        This method is used to add a room record into the roomRecords arrayList to populate the JTable. It should only be called from the other addRoomRecord method in this class
        Parameters:
        roomArray - a String array representing room values
